title: Citizenship certificates and naturalization documents
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, country of origin, naturalization date, certificate number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake citizenship certificates. Domain binding verifies government authority. Passport application requirement. Permanent legal status. Prevents citizenship fraud. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
